hero.name: Rafael
hero.description: Web development specialist using PHP, ASP Classic and SQL Server. I turn ideas into efficient and scalable digital solutions.
about.title: About Me
about.text1: Developer experienced in building robust and scalable web solutions, specialized in backend technologies such as PHP and ASP Classic, with strong knowledge of SQL Server databases.
about.text2: My focus is delivering clean, efficient and well-documented code, always applying best development practices and the right technologies for each project.

process.step3.desc: Rigorous testing, code review and quality assurance before each delivery.

process.step4.desc: Controlled deployment, complete documentation and post-delivery support.
